title: Implementing .NET Core Logging Levels and Categories
content: In .NET Core. One thing that I never implemented was granular control of logging specific levels by category. It turns out that it’s pretty easy to do, though. Logging in .NET Core passes LogLevel and Category whenever something is to be logged. Category corresponds, afaik, to namespaces. Y
